title: window 10 problem
body: ever since i upgraded to window 10 i keep freezing in game and it causes me to lose lane and the game. I dont know why it keeps doing that PLZ HELP!!!

replies.body:
In order to get an idea of what steps can be taken to resolve this, I'll need a bit more detail on the issue. When you say freeze, does your entire computer freeze and you aren't able to *ALT+TAB* out of game, or is this more of a freeze as in your FPS and ping stay the same, but stuff stops moving for a bit then later catches up? 

With this info, I'll be able to provide you with an accurate set of steps to take that will address this.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IT6WO197,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-28T22:46:20.155+0000)
>
> In order to get an idea of what steps can be taken to resolve this, I'll need a bit more detail on the issue. When you say freeze, does your entire computer freeze and you aren't able to *ALT+TAB* out of game, or is this more of a freeze as in your FPS and ping stay the same, but stuff stops moving for a bit then later catches up? 
> 
> With this info, I'll be able to provide you with an accurate set of steps to take that will address this.

Hello Riot guys and League friends. I found this thread interesting, as i have the same problem. A few days ago, i upgraded to Windows 10 in my PC; and I checked it outand its quite cool xD. Point is, as i opened LOl to play, (as always), i found that i was getting fine ping (according to my region), but halved FPS. Logically, the game lags and stutters all. So i was searching for a little help around the boards. Thanks beforehand.

Hey Friend,

FPS issues can be caused by a number of factors, but after an OS upgrade, the most likely causes are bad graphics drivers or missing/corrupt files in your League installation. To assist you in investigating these potential causes, I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if that helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IT6WO197,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-31T15:33:43.243+0000)
>
> Hey Friend,
> 
> FPS issues can be caused by a number of factors, but after an OS upgrade, the most likely causes are bad graphics drivers or missing/corrupt files in your League installation. To assist you in investigating these potential causes, I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.
> ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)
> 
> Let me know if that helped.

Hello there. Hmm i see, well, i did every single step in the guide, and it continues to produce a horrible 30 FPS gameplay. Maybe i can send a ticket or IDK?
Thanks for replying.

I definitely recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech team since you've worked through that guide and experienced no change. I strongly suggest attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) so we'll have all the context necessary to address the issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IT6WO197,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-02T16:00:41.227+0000)
>
> I definitely recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech team since you've worked through that guide and experienced no change. I strongly suggest attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) so we'll have all the context necessary to address the issue.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Ok Riot friend. That i will do. Just to add another comment, today I picked up my PC at the repair store, and i got a cleaned PC and everything. Got home with it, to try a custom game, and guess what? Still 30 FPS:( 
And in top of that, it now freezes and stutters.
Please i need some help :(
I see you put in a ticket, so with your patience, a tech specialist will get back to you soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IT6WO197,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-07T15:37:23.834+0000)
>
> I see you put in a ticket, so with your patience, a tech specialist will get back to you soon.

Hi Targons Blade, i rolled back to WIN7 and the issue seems to have followed me. I sent a ticket and everything, but i dont know, i dont know what else to think. Any ideas, or a possible fix for this?
(Issue is: in every single game, my stable 70+FPS goes to 0-1 and i cant move, or control anything. I just hear the annoying slow and stuttered sound of the game in a super "slow motion mode".
It happens with almost every champion i can use. It happens from custom games to normal 5v5 and ARAMs. It happens at the start, or sometimes at 20 min of game, or sometimes just randomly. Other times, like 1 out of 10, it doesnt happens.
Its super annoying. PLS Help.)

I took a look at the ticket you have open with one of our tech specialists. There are pretty big signs that this may be caused by overheating or failing hardware, so I agree with your specialist that this should be looked at by a local computer shop before it becomes a much larger issue.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hi Noobiz! 
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
i cant alt tab i have to crtl+alt+del to get out the game
So after upgrading to Windows 10, you experience freezes in the game when you try to alt+tab?
